name: Slide Slash
description: FEATURES There are customizable guns, swords, robot enemys, wallrunning, sliding, unlockable gun skins and much more! DEVELOPMENT This game is not released yet but there is a demo and will be released soon. No release date is planned yet. If i earn enough money from donations, i will try and upload it to steam! MUSIC You can listen to all the music here : https://f4close.bandcamp.com/album/slide-slash-soundtrack HOW TO DOWNLOAD 1. Press the download button 2. If you dont want to donate click the 'no thanks just take me to the downloads' button 3. Wait for the zip file to download 4. Unzip the zip file 5. Open the unzipped folder 6. Double click the 'slide slash.exe' 7. Have fun!
